channel.description:
Host Ben Frawley and Guests will discuss numerous topic about cult classics, good movies, bad movies, and movies you should be watching. CULT CINEMA CULT MOVIES CULT EVERYTHING!!!! Visit us at
www.livenudeswearing.com This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.title: EPISODE 2.31 - Foriegn Cult Movie Fest!
item.author: Devo523@sbcglobal.net
item.description: Thanks to a movie suggestion from Gregory Joseph to do some Indonesian Cult movies for the show Ben and Kara review some gems from the Far East. Two Indonesian Exploitation Films, Mystics in Bali and Lady Terminator. Then Ben and Kara go to Italy to review Amazons and Supermen. Different Countries but all rich in exploitation.

item.title: EPISODE 2.29 - Airport '09: The Entire Airport Series

item.title: EPISODE 2.22 - Knightriders
item.author: Devo523@sbcglobal.net
item.description: Get out of here Hasselhoff!! Knightriders is a George A Romero movie Starring Ed Harris and most of the Cast of Dawn of the Dead (1978). The movie is about renaissance festivals with motorcycles - OMG!!! It doesn't get more Cult that this. Ben and Kara review this must see for all cult movie lovers.
